name: com.android.permissioncontroller.permission.ui.legacy.AppPermissionActivity
description: Manage a single permission of a single app. @deprecated This class is deprecated for handheld UI, and will throw an error if used for handheld (read: non auto, TV, or wear) UIs. Instead, users should create an intent with the ACTION_MANAGE_APP_PERMISSION action, which will intent into the ManagePermissionsActivity. @see ManagePermissionsActivity
